name: Tokyo
WelcomeMessage:
- Yōkoso Tokyo e! - Welcome to Tokyo! The heart of Japan, where tradition and innovation collide! Tokyo provides everything between serene temples and towering skyscrapers, a global icon of progress! Beneath the vibrant facade however, lie challenges that test even the most progressed and advanced cities. To set the scene, Tokyo faces two distinct issues that threaten its future sustainability: Growing impacts of natural disasters, and ever rising urban heat levels. To get to the bottom of this, you will have to navigate the different solutions presented to you,
to make sure Tokyo can persevere as the strong-spirited metropolis that it is!

rewardItems.name: Golden Ōgi
rewardItems.description: A stunning golden fan, that represents balance, refinement, and near perfection. A treasure of those that have achieved greatness, but strive for more.
rewardItems.endgamefeedback: With unparalleled foresight and careful decision-making in Tokyo, your city shines as an example of balance, refinement, and near perfection. The Golden Ōgi represents how you have seamlessly integrated solutions like earthquake-resilient buildings, large-scale heat mitigation strategies, and sustainable urban planning. Your city stands strong, not just as a beacon of hope but as a model for future generations to emulate—a near-perfect harmony of innovation and sustainability!

rewardItems.name: Silver Torii Gate
rewardItems.description: A Torii gate symbolizes progress and milestones. Let it guide you further beyond!
rewardItems.endgamefeedback: The Silver Torii Gate symbolizes the significant progress you’ve made in Tokyo, but it also reminds you of opportunities missed. While your contributions have laid a strong fundament for your city, some choices lacked the ambition to fully unlock Tokyo’s potential. Your new city benefits from the improved urban planning and sustainability changes, but it could have reached even higher with bolder decisions. A commendable effort nonetheless, guiding your city toward future milestones!

rewardItems.name: Bronze Daruma Doll
rewardItems.description: A traditional spiritual talisman, that symbolizes perseverance - 'Fall seven times, rise up eight.'
rewardItems.endgamefeedback: The Bronze Daruma Doll reflects your resilience and perseverance through Tokyo’s challenges, but also represents a reminder of what could have been. Many opportunities for impactful change were left aside. While your city benefits from incremental improvements, it struggles to match its full potential. Let this be a lesson in striving for greater more—because just as the Daruma Doll rises again after falling, so too can your city rise stronger with the knowledge gained from this journey!

urbanChallenges.name: Earthquake-Resistant Buildings
urbanChallenges.description:
Tokyo is located in one of the most earthquake-prone regions on the planet.

It is vital to have earthquake-resilient buildings that protect the lives of the Japanese people, and the properties themselves. However, this is a costly affair that also requires strict codes.

How will you fare in face of this challenge?

options.description: Strengthen building codes to ensure all new constructions are earthquake-resistant.
Provide financial incentives to retrofit older buildings for earthquake resistance.
Focus only on emergency shelters while ignoring long-term building safety.

urbanChallenges.name: Flood Risk Reduction
urbanChallenges.description:
Tokyo experiences frequent flooding, especially during typhoon seasons and during heavy rainfall.
To manage flood risk, a balance between large-scale infrastructure and nature-based solutions is required.

What strategy will you implement to ensure the city remains dry and protected?

options.description: Install permeable pavements and rain gardens in urban areas.
Increase reliance on sandbags and temporary barriers.
Build large-scale underground floodwater storage and advanced drainage systems.

urbanChallenges.name: Typhoon Early Warning Systems
urbanChallenges.description:
Typhoons pose a significant risk to Tokyo's populace, with high winds and heavy rains, causing damage and disruption.
Early warning systems can save lives, by ensuring people have time to prepare and evacuate.

How will you improve Tokyo's preparedness for the next big storm?

options.description: Rely on outdated meteorological systems for warnings.
Develop AI-based forecasting systems and public evacuation apps.
Expand community awareness programs for typhoon preparedness.

urbanChallenges.name: Urban Greening (Heat Mitigation)
urbanChallenges.description:
Rising urban temperatures in Tokyo are worsened by the lack of greenery and dense concrete structures.
Green roofs, urban trees, and parks can help reduce heat and improve the air quality.

How will you cool down the city while enhancing its livability?

options.description: Mandate green roofs and walls for all new developments.
Install artificial shade structures instead of vegetation.
Plant urban trees and increase public green spaces.

urbanChallenges.name: Cool Pavements (Heat Mitigation)
urbanChallenges.description:
Traditional asphalt pavements absorb and retain heat, making Tokyo's streets unbearably hot during summer.
Cool pavements, like reflective surfaces or water-retaining materials, can help reduce ground-level temperatures.

What steps will you take to make Tokyo's streets cooler?

options.description: Focus on public relations campaigns without addressing root causes.
Replace all high-traffic roads with reflective or water-retaining pavements.
Gradually install cool pavements in selected districts.
